title: Ka rinnain a thlir
lyrics:
Ka rinnain a thlir,
Kalvari Beramno,
Chhantu Pathian;
Ka tawngtai ngaithla la,
Ka sual mawh la bovin,
Ka pumin min nei la,
Tun atang hian.

Tichak la, i thatin,
Ka thinlung chau tak hi,
Thahnem ngai se;
Ka tan i thih vangin,
Ka hmangaih thungna che,
Takzet leh thianghlimin
Alh fo rawh se.

Thim zinga ka kalin,
Buaina min chim lai hian,
Min hruai ang che;
Thim lai thleng ang che,
Lungngaih mittuite nen,
I hnen ata vah bo
Min phal suh la.

Lei nun a tawp hunin,
Thihna tui vawt chuanin,
Minn chim hunan;
Hmangaih Chhandamtu,
Thlaphan, hlauh tibo la,
Famkima chhandamin,
Min hruai chho la.
